gettingHere.title: Getting Here
gettingHere.description: We are located in the heart of New York, street parking is free on Sundays, and our parking deck is located just a couple blocks away at the Central Plaza Garage on Main St. The parking deck is open from 8a-3p on Sundays.

gatheringDetails.title: Gathering Details
gatheringDetails.description: Sunday gatherings are a space for you and your family to join in the fellowship of the people of God, be enriched by the teachings of the Word of God, and lift your voices in joyful song to the praises of God. We gather at 9:30a and 11:30a every Sunday at The Life Center.

familyMinistries.title: Family Ministries
familyMinistries.description: Our family ministries on Sundays are located just a few doors down from The Life Center at 123 Faith St. We have a place for children ages 6 weeks through 5th grade during both morning gatherings. Middle and high school students meet during the 11:30a gathering only.

livestream.title: Join Our Live Service
livestream.subtitle: Worship with us from anywhere in the world
livestream.serviceDescription: Join Pastor David for our weekly worship service as we dive into God's Word together.

reminder.title: Set a Reminder
reminder.message: We'll remind you when we go live!

shareModal.title: Share This Stream
shareModal.message: Share our livestream with your friends and family!

littleStars.title: Little Stars
littleStars.description: We've designed our environment very intentionally to allow worship and teaching to come alive for even the tiniest in our House. Each child is assigned to a bloom room based on either age or stage of development.

loveWorldKids.title: Love World Kids
loveWorldKids.description: We want to lean in with families who are raising a generation of children to know and walk in a relationship with Jesus. Each child is assigned to a boys or girls-based tent grouped by their grade.

loveWorldYouth.title: Love World Youth
loveWorldYouth.description: We exist to awaken and inspire a generation of middle and high school students to live their lives for the fame and renown of Jesus. Love World Youth meets on Sundays during the 11:30a gathering only.

communityConnectManhattan.title: Community Connect (Manhattan)
communityConnectManhattan.description: Connect with neighbors and build lasting relationships in your local community!

communityConnectBrooklyn.title: Community Connect (Brooklyn)
communityConnectBrooklyn.description: Connect with neighbors and build lasting relationships in your local community!

youngAdultsGathering.title: Young Adults Gathering
youngAdultsGathering.description: If you're a student or young professional in the city, this evening is just for you!

joinUs.subtitle: Become a Light Bearer
joinUs.title: Get Involved
joinUs.description: We say Light Bearers instead of volunteers because volunteers can sound like people who randomly sign up and hopefully show up, while Light Bearers take ownership and take great pleasure in opening a way for others to see and experience Jesus. If you're ready to start serving and help make a way for people to experience Jesus, we'd love for you to sign up to be a Light Bearer!
